actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes one bite attack and, if available, uses Blinding Spittle.

actions.name: Bites
actions.description: Medium or smaller target DC 10 STR save or knocked prone; killed targets are absorbed.

actions.name: Blinding Spittle (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Spits at a point within 15 ft.; creatures within 5 ft. make DC 13 DEX save or are blinded until end of mouther's next turn.
